Articles.Content:
Yesterday - [3/23/2020]

I updated my GPU drivers to 445.75 and all seemed to work just fine, but yesterday I did not play any KSP. [gasp]

Today, when I went to launch KSP modded 1.9.1 and it would crash, I then tested with an unmodded 1.9.1 and it crashed and also tried 1.8.1 and it did the same thing, wouldn't even get to the progress bar before showing the crash KSP little kerbal dialog.

I rolled to 442.74 and KSP now works..

I might be a special case , but I thought I would report this.

I am going to post again on this..

I had a Win10 update, it seems to have updated my PC to the latest GPU driver and again I am was able to run 1.9.1, but previous versions were able to.  Anyone have any suggestions, as I am sure I will run into this problem again..

And.. I am back.

Thanks to the very smart peeps in chat, it would seem that there was a bug for the "Sharpening" option that I was using through the Nvidia Control panel that was fixed with version 445.78
